page.title: 05CONSTANTINE ADMINISTRATION
page.content: {PARISH COUNCIL CHAIRMAN}MR. D. BRAY,13yrs.in office.FINANCE Â£ 3,000 a year.MEMBERS 11.MEETINGS Every month nearest Thursday to 20th public given 1/4 of an hour to speak.USE OF MONEY street lighting,wages for clerk and others who help to cut grass and inspect foot paths and playground,also car park rent JOB DESCRIPTION deal with parish planning problems,rights of way drainage,eyesores.Cheques must be signed by Chairman ,clerk and another member.ELECTIONS every four years. {P.C.CORBETT,COMMUNITY POLICEMAN.AREA COVERED 12,000 acres.POPULATION 5,000 DIVISION A Falmouth/Penryn.PUBLIC ORDER teenagers creating a disturbance in evening,parking problems.CRIME more in summer when tourists around,eg.car thefts and unpaid hotel bills.FIREARMS popular in area checked every 3 yrs.
